input.sentences: we went to grandmothers for a picinic .
she had lots of food out on the table .
the family sat around and talked .
we all got to catch up with each other .
output.sentences: I've been invited to an Easter picnic at my grandmothers house.
On the table there is a big variety of foods, almost too much to eat!
Me and my family all sat around the table and talked over the delicious food spread.
We hid the Easter eggs for the children as they waited for the hunt to begin.
They children found all of the eggs (with a little help) and cracked them open for treats!
